summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Lip Cheat Lip Liner is a long-wearing, velvety lip liner to reshape and resize the look of lips, available in multiple shades.
details: DetailsBenefitsLip Cheat Lip Liner creates a smooth, seamless line to resize and reshape for a fuller pout.The no-smudge, waterproof formula lasts up to six hours with no feathering or transferring.The texture is rich and velvety to layer comfortably on your lips. Wear alone or with a gloss for a lighter finish.Matte Finish.Long-Wearing.Without Parabens.Item 2619395How To UseOutline your lips starting with the corner of the top lip. For a fuller lip look, draw over the edge of your natural lip line.Fill in your lips using the matching lipstick shade.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Synthetic Wax, Isododecane, Polybutene, Mica, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Ceresin, Ozokerite, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexylene Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Outline your lips starting with the corner of the top lip. For a fuller lip look, draw over the edge of your natural lip line.Fill in your lips using the matching lipstick shade.
ingredients: Hexylene Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: beautiful, but issues
reviews.comments: I love the color, very natural, but the "lead" broke off on initial use. Sharpened it and it broke again. So, I have about ¾ of a pencil for full price.

reviews.headline: Waste of money
reviews.comments: The tip breaks off immediately amd then you cant sharpen it. I've tried 3 different pencils all did same thing. Even put in the freezer to see if i can sharpen without any luck. Help!!

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this again.
reviews.comments: I love this pencil.  It has great staying power.  I only wish it didn't require sharpening.   But I still Love it!

reviews.headline: gorgina color
reviews.comments: blends nicely and is such a pretty color, bsfs fav

reviews.headline: Loved the color
reviews.comments: This was my first time trying products from Charlotte Tilbury and I'm really pleased with the color. It glides on really well. Is states it self sharpening but it doesn't work when I try to advance the pen. It turns but nothing advances. It must be a defective pencil.

reviews.headline: Best Ive found so far
reviews.comments: Doesnt bleed and stays put for a long time.  Will purchase again.

reviews.headline: Perfect colour and quality
reviews.comments: It is my beloved brand . I bought it second time and will buy it again and again.

reviews.headline: it's worth it
reviews.comments: unfortunately this is the best lip liner ive tried. i dont wear lip stick or lip gloss or any lip color often. and this is literally my lip color but just slightly pinkier but not too far off where you can tell where i overline slightly. ive tried just about every other dupe ive seen online and no other color compares to this. i didnt want to spend the money but unfortunately it is so so worth. just buy the real thing and dont waste your money searching for a dupe - you wont find it!

reviews.headline: Yep!
reviews.comments: Color is good on me (fair, blonde w blue eyes) and I just use this to color in my lips - looks natural and lasts.

reviews.headline: Only lip liner brand you need
reviews.comments: I will never wear another brand again.  Great formula, easy to apply, long lasting and all around the best lip product I've ever worn. I have converted my whole lip routine to Charlotte Tilbury.

reviews.headline: Only lip liner brand you need
reviews.comments: I will never wear another brand again.  Great formula, easy to apply, long lasting and all around the best lip product I've ever worn. I have converted my whole lip routine to Charlotte Tilbury.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Great color, easy application

reviews.headline: Tip broke off immediately
reviews.comments: Barely applied any pressue and the tip broke off - this is to expensive for any wasted product

reviews.headline: Best Ever
reviews.comments: I use this for a full lip color in the shade Pillow Talk (original). It gives full coverage and camouflages a scar on my upper lip quite well. I use the lipstick as well but lip cheat is my main lip color source.

reviews.headline: The color is not what I wanted
reviews.comments: Let me say this: I am on the darker end of the spectrum. I wanted a deep berry color, so I went for Berry Naughty. I was hoping for a plum like color and what I got was a mauve! If you look at the swatch they have for the color, it's quite deeper even on the deeper skin model. I was quite disappointed.

reviews.headline: Really pretty
reviews.comments: Goes on good  stays on well

reviews.headline: The best nude liner out there!
reviews.comments: I have tons of lip liners and Charlotte Tilbury is the best (along with Mac). The perfect nude is just as it says, the perfect nude. It glides on easily and stays put. I also love the colors Light Pillowtalk, Pillowtalk, and Pillowtalk Medium. I am very fair skinned. These liners are so beautiful, I hope she never discontinues this shade or the Pillowtalk ones.

reviews.headline: Favorite lipliner
reviews.comments: Please do not discontinue this shade of lipliner - M.I. Kiss.  It goes perfect with my Charlotte Tilbury lipstick that I absolutely love - Glowing Jen

reviews.headline: iconic nude is iconic
reviews.comments: on the recommendation of someone on tiktok, I purchased this product in the shade Iconic Nude and it is by far my favorite lipliner. I wear it every day now. when i run out I will keep repurchasing this shade.

reviews.headline: I've found it!!
reviews.comments: The PERFECT nude shade!! I've been looking for a nude that wasn't too pinky but wasn't too brown but also went with my skin tone and this is the best. The best thing about it is it stays on all day plus goes with any skin tone as a nude.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product free from @influenster & @charlottetilbury in exchange for my honest opinion.  The Charlotte Tilbury Lip Cheat Liner in the shade Red Carpet Red is a game-changer for anyone looking to achieve impeccable lip precision. This lip liner is more than just a tool; it's an essential element in crafting a flawless, red-carpet-ready pout.
What immediately stands out is its creamy texture, which effortlessly glides onto the lips, creating a smooth and even base. The Red Carpet Red shade, a vibrant and classic red, complements a spectrum of lip colors, making it versatile for various lipstick pairings.
Precision is the key strength of this liner. The fine tip allows for precise outlining, preventing feathering or bleeding of lip color. This meticulous application ensures that your lips look defined and polished, enhancing the overall appearance of your makeup.
The longevity of the Lip Cheat Liner is what lacked for me. While a great liner and helped hold the lipstick more inside the area of the lips better, it wasn't long lasting enough for me.. it actually came off in a matter of a couple hours and did long last for any eating. Charlotte Tilbury's Red Carpet Red Lip Cheat Liner is more than a beauty product; it's a tool for achieving lip perfection, allowing you to confidently stride onto your own metaphorical red carpet, wherever life takes you.
faceoff_positive.headline: For red carpet moments anywhere

faceoff_negative.comments:
First off: I LOVE this color. I did at first use and i still do. I dont understand how its my perfect nude and so many others. 

THEN, after using I noticed when I caught a glimpse of myself in a mirror, that the lip liner had like bleed or smudged into my skin off of my lip line. Thinking it was a smudge, i tried again….and it happened again. Thus determining: the lip liner bleeds off of my lips and into my skin and away from my lips, staining it….which is not super fun. 

This deeply saddens me because i loved the color so much. So Sometimes when i want live life dangling on cliff of uncertainty, always having to think: "is my lip liner smudged like crazy around my mouth like a clown, and do i look crazy without knowing it?"…i still wear it out because of the color.
faceoff_negative.headline: From awe to oh no!
